# Research Interests

- **Process Dynamics in Judgement and Decision Making**: Exploring the temporal dynamics of cognitive and affective processes underlying human judgment and decision making.
- **Methods of Process Tracing**: Developing and applying process-tracing methods to uncover temporal dynamics of cognitive processes underlying human behavior.
- **Cognitive Modelling (DDM, ABM, DFT)**: Using formal cognitive models such as Drift Diffusion Model, Agent-Based Modeling, and Dynamic Field Theory to simulate and explain the cognitive processes driving human behavior.
- **Behavior Change**: Investigating psychological drivers and interventions that promote sustainable and health-related change in human behavior.
- **Meta-science**: Examining the practices, methods, and structures of psychological science to improve research transparency, reproducibility, and cumulative knowledge building.

\vspace{-10pt}


# Teaching Interests

- **Psychological Research Methods**: Teaching rigorous research design and methodology to foster critical thinking, transparency, and reproducibility in psychological science.
- **Statistics**: Introducing statistical reasoning and providing hands-on training on tools for analyzing psychological data in a reproducible manner.
- **Programming \& Data Science**: Providing hands-on training for programming and data analytics in R and MATLAB for transparent, reproducible, and efficient handling, visualization, evaluation of psychological data.
- **Cognitive Modeling**: Introducing formal modeling techniques to stimulate better reasoning and theory building in psychological science.
- **Meta analysis \& Meta studies**: Teaching methods for synthesizing evidence across studies and to establish robust and generalizable psychological research findings.

# Presentations / Conferences
```{r}
pres = get_cv_sheet('presentations') |> 
    mutate(
        with = ifelse(is.na(with), '.', paste0(', with ', with)),
        title = paste0(enquote(title), with),
        # title = paste0("*", title, "*", with),
        title = ifelse(is.na(series), title, paste(title, series, sep = '. ')),
        host = if_else(
            category == "poster",
            paste0("Poster presented at ", host),
            paste0("Talk presented at ", host)
        ),
        date = paste0(format(as.Date(date), format = "%Y"), '.'),
        citation = paste0(title, ' ', host, ', ', location, '. ', date)
    ) |> 
    arrange(desc(date))

pres_counts = pres |>
    count(category) |>
    left_join(
        data.frame(
            category = c("invited", "conference", "poster"),
            order = seq(3)
        ),
        by = "category"
    ) |>
    mutate(
        category = str_to_title(category),
        category = ifelse(category == 'Invited', 'Invited Speaker', category),
        category = ifelse(category == 'Conference', 'Conference Presentation', category),
        category = ifelse(category == 'Poster', 'Poster Presentation', category),
        cite = paste0(category, ' (', n, ')')
    ) |>
    arrange(order) |>
    pull(cite) |>
    paste(collapse = ', ')
```

# Advising
```{r}
advisees <- get_cv_sheet('advising') |> 
    mutate(
        date = case_when(
            complete == 0 ~ ' (current).',
            is.na(date_stop) ~ '.',
            is.na(date_start) ~ paste0(' (', date_stop, ').'),
            .default = paste0(' (',  date_start, ' to ', date_stop, ').')
        ),
        date_start = if_else(is.na(date_start), date_stop, date_start),
        with = ifelse(is.na(with), '', paste0(', with ', with)),
        citation = if_else(
            is.na(title), name, paste0(name, ', ', enquote(title))
        ),
        citation = paste0(citation, ', ', institution, with, date),
        citation = if_else(
            is.na(defense_date),
            citation,
            paste0(citation, ' _Defense date: ', defense_date, '_.')
        )
    ) |> 
    arrange(date_start, name)
```

# Grants

```{r}
grants <- get_cv_sheet('grants') |> 
    filter(awarded == 1) |> 
    mutate(
        sponsor = if_else(
            !is.na(id),
            paste0(sponsor, " (No. ", id, ")"),
            sponsor
        ),
        title = enquote(title),
        amount = if_else(
            is.na(budget_total), 
            "",
            label_euro(budget_total)
        ),
        percent = budget_me / budget_total,
        credit = case_when(
            percent == 1 ~ "100% Credit",
            percent != 1 ~ paste0("Schoemann portion ", scales::dollar(budget_me)),
            .default = "Affiliated researcher"
        ),
        colabs = case_when(
            affiliated == 1 & !is.na(collaborators) ~ paste(paste0("PI: ", collaborators), amount, sep = '. '),
            affiliated == 0 & !is.na(collaborators) ~ paste(paste0("With ", collaborators), amount, sep = '. '),
            .default = amount
        ),
        period = paste0(period, '.')
    ) |> 
    arrange(desc(submitted))
```
